JobTitle: Internal Comms Senior Manager-Deloitte’s Green Dot Agency
JobFullDesc: Internal Comms Senior Manager 2Think a Big Four career is just spreadsheets, gray suits, and corporate profits? Look again. Deloitte's full-service Marketing Excellence (ME) organization is seeking collaborative creatives, skillful strategists, and marketing masterminds to lead our businesses in exciting new directions. If you're a marketing and communications professional who sees the world differently, finds opportunity where others don't, and keeps a pulse on the next big trends, then become our partner in growth. Together we'll discover new ways to transform out-of-the-box ideas into measurable business results for our clients and our company. If you're ready to make an impact, join our ME team to see how we Deloitte differently.Our Communications Center of Excellence in the Green Dot Agency is looking for an Internal Communications Senior Manager 2 to lead up our internal communications capabilitiesYou will act as primary advisor and strategist for your team to guide the development of innovative internal communications strategies that deliver key marketplace messages to internal audiences. You will also act as the interface and advisor with colleagues in the Green Dot Agency, as well as strategic marketers and key stakeholders in the businesses, as warranted. Your primary objectives will include enhancing client conversations through internal campaigns, growing attendance and engagement in market-facing activities, and/or increasing employee participation in brand ambassadorship.The TeamThe Green Dot Agency is Deloitte's in-house agency. Sitting within the Marketing Excellence (ME) organization, we provide value to Deloitte by differentiating the Deloitte brand, driving Deloitte's business priorities forward, innovating new marketing solutions, and delivering distinct client experiences. We develop cutting-edge marketing plans, creative assets, and unique experiences that engage our clients; deliver on the strategy of our businesses in the marketplace; and capture the hearts, minds,
